attributes.action: Give the UK public a referendum on voting reform.
attributes.additional_details: less than 30% of the population voted conservative in the last general election and yet they have a majority in the house of commons.
attributes.background: The voting system in place in the UK is incredibly unfair and creates a Parliament that does not represent the votes of the people. Reform of the voting system is needed to change this and insure that every vote is not just counted but that every vote counts.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what kind of voting reform you would like to be decided on by referendum. If you would like a referendum on proportional representation, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/142817
